post:
Hello LET! 

We are introducing the perfect server for idling! Think of your perfect idling scenario, this baby can do it. Low cost LXC servers hosted in Norway with 1 IPv4 and a full /48 IPv6 prefix.

Who are we?

Terrahost is a hosting provider founded in 2006 located in Sandefjord, Norway. We own and operate our own datacenters. The newest datacenter DC2 was completed in Q2 2018 and is built within an old air raid shelter.

**Check out our latest datacenter here: [https://terrahost.no/datasenter](https://terrahost.no/datasenter)**

**LG:** http://lg.terrahost.no/
**AS Info:** https://bgp.he.net/AS203629
**BGP:** No
**Recurring:** Yes
**TUN/TAP:** Yes

**Transits**
Altibox (AS29695)
Blix (AS50304)
HE.net - IPv6 (AS6939)

**Points of Presence**
Terrahost, K10 (Sandefjord)
Verizon, HMG9 (Oslo)

**256MB RAM, 15GB HDD**

    Cores: 1
    RAM: 256MB (Swap 256MB)
    HDD: 15GB (RAID10 - HDD)
    IPv4: 1
    IPv6: /48 Prefix
    Traffic: 500GB
    Port: 1 Gbit
    Virtualization: LXC
    Datacenter: Terrahost, Norway
    Templates: CentOS 6, 7, Debian 9, 10, Ubuntu 18.04
    **Price per month: 1 EUR**
    **Annual payments**
**[Order here](https://terrahost.no/handlekurv/2800)**

**256MB RAM, 50GB HDD**

    Cores: 1
    RAM: 256MB (Swap 256MB)
    HDD: 50GB (RAID10 - HDD)
    IPv4: 1
    IPv6: /48 Prefix
    Traffic: 500GB
    Port: 1 Gbit
    Virtualization: LXC
    Datacenter: Terrahost, Norway
    Templates: CentOS 6, 7, Debian 9, 10, Ubuntu 18.04
    **Price per month: 1.5 EUR**
    **Annual payments**
**[Order here](https://terrahost.no/handlekurv/2799)**

**Limited number of servers available!**

**Payment**
We accept PayPal, Stripe (Cards) and BitCoin
